entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
